original_text: After that, Jesus went into heaven. Now he is sitting at God's right side. He rules over angels and over everything that has authority and power. 3: The right side means the most important place. It shows that Jesus has the same authority as his Father. After that, Jesus went into heaven. Now he is sitting at God's right side. He rules over angels and over everything that has authority and power.
korean_text: 그는 하늘에 오르사 하나님 우편에 계시니 천사들과 권세들과 능력들이 그에게 복종하느니라

sentences.original_text: After that, Jesus went into heaven.
Now he is sitting at God's right side.
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 그는 하나님의 오른편에 앉아 계십니다.

sentences.original_text: and over everything that has authority and power.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 권위와 능력을 가진 모든 것을 다스립니다.

sentences.original_text: The right side means the most important place.
It shows that Jesus has the same authority as his Father.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 예수님이 아버지와 동일한 권위를 가지고 있음을 보여줍니다.
